h_1: Your heart is a force for change:
h_2: financial support to make a difference in the world!
p_1: I will be very grateful for moral and material support that you can provide. Your feedback, suggestions and wishes will help me to become better and more efficient. You can share your experience of using my projects and tell me about your ideas for improvement. You can also make a donation to help develop and support my activities. Your support will be an incentive for my further development and development of useful projects. I strive to make my work as convenient and useful for you as possible, and your support will help to make my goals a reality.
